import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import Background from'../common/Background';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{const projects=[{title:"E-Commerce Platform",description:"A full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product management, and payment integration.",technologies:["React","Node.js","MongoDB","Stripe"],image:"placeholder.jpg",liveLink:"https://project1.com",githubLink:"https://github.com/username/project1"},{title:"Task Management App",description:"A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team features.",technologies:["React","Firebase","Material-UI"],image:"placeholder.jpg",liveLink:"https://project2.com",githubLink:"https://github.com/username/project2"}// Add more projects as needed
];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Background,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{initial:{opacity:0},animate:{opacity:1},transition:{duration:0.5},className:"min-h-screen py-20",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-6xl mx-auto px-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.h1,{initial:{y:-20},animate:{y:0},className:"text-4xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-12 text-center",children:"My Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8",children:projects.map((project,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{initial:{y:50,opacity:0},animate:{y:0,opacity:1},transition:{delay:index*0.1},className:"bg-white rounded-lg overflow-hidden shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow duration-300",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"h-48 bg-gray-200",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full h-full flex items-center justify-center text-gray-400",children:"Project Image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-2",children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600 mb-4",children:project.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-4",children:project.technologies.map((tech,techIndex)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"px-3 py-1 bg-gray-100 text-gray-600 rounded-full text-sm",children:tech},techIndex))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.liveLink,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"btn btn-primary flex-1 text-center",children:"Live Demo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:project.githubLink,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"btn border border-gray-300 hover:border-gray-400 flex-1 text-center",children:"GitHub"})]})]})]},index))})]})})});};export default Projects;
